variables.value: {{"⚠️ Urgent Report Digest: " & length(2.array) & " Urgent Reports"}}

{{ifempty(5.`3`; "—")}}
{{ifempty(5.`0`; "—")}}
{{ifempty(5.`1`; "—")}} {{ifempty(5.`6`; "—")}} {{ifempty(5.`9`; "—")}} {{ifempty(5.`7`; "Urgent")}} {{if(length(ifempty(5.`8`; emptystring)) > 110; substring(ifempty(5.`8`; emptystring); 0; 110) & "..."; ifempty(5.`8`; emptystring))}} Listen

mapper.content:
RK Field Reporting
Urgent Reports Digest
Digest Date: {{3.Current_Date}}
Total Urgent Pending: {{3.Total_Count}}
These items were queued as Urgent. Please review, listen, and dispatch next steps.
Required Actions
  • Open the recording first, then confirm severity + next action.
  • If materials / tools / access issue: dispatch today and update crew.
  • If life/safety risk appears: escalate immediately (Critical/Emergency path).
{{6.text}}
RK Field Reporting • Automated Notification
This digest reflects queued urgent items at send time. Rows are marked Sent after delivery.
mapper.subject: {{3.Email_Subject}}

mapper.text:
**⚠️ URGENT REPORTS BATCHED**

Sent digest for **{{3.Total_Count}}** urgent items from Alert_Queue.

✅ Rows marked **Sent** in Alert_Queue.

spec.help: The HTTPS URL that hosts the image.
spec.name: imageUrl
spec.label: Image URL

spec.help: The alternative text of this image, used for accessibility.
spec.name: altText
spec.label: Alternative Text

spec.help:
The wrap text setting.
If `true`, the text wraps and displays on multiple lines.
Otherwise, the text is truncated.
Only applies to `Text`, not `Top Label` and `BottomLabel`.
spec.name: wrapText
spec.label: Wrap Text

spec.help:
The text that appears above Text.
Always truncates.
spec.name: topLabel
spec.label: Top Label

spec.help:
The text that appears below Text.
Always truncates.
spec.name: bottomLabel
spec.label: Bottom Label

spec.help: A switch widget can be clicked to change its state and trigger an action.
spec.name: switchControl

spec.help: The name by which the switch widget is identified in a form input event.
spec.name: name
spec.label: Name

spec.help: The value entered by a user, returned as part of a form input event.
spec.name: value
spec.label: Value

spec.help: How the switch appears in the user interface.
spec.name: controlType
spec.label: Control Type
Switch Control
